messages: You find yourself in a dark forest
It's cold and you want to go home
Will you find your way out of the forest?
You find a small stone structure
Seeking shelter you discover an old iron ladder leading down into the belly of the earth

user_replies.back: Go back to the starting point

messages: You decide to follow the right path
In the distance you can see your home

user_replies.back: Go back to the starting point
user_replies.win: End your journey and go home

messages: You open your home door, finding your family alright
You step to the fireplace, your wife hands you warm coco
As you climb down the ladder a stenching smell hits your nose
The green gloomy stone blocks forming the cellar you climbed down to seem decades old
In the dim light you spot a door
As you crank the handle of the door, you hear a growling sound
You try to close the door, but it's too late
A giant wolf with red eyes jumps out of the dark behind the door and eats you alive
Hopefully he wont find your family
